fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators

Class CoordinationRTEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.SimulationEngine
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.CoordinationEngine
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.CoordinationRTEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VariableInitialisationI, CoordinatorI, ParentNotificationI, RTSimulatorI, SimulationManagementI, SimulatorI, java.io.Serializable

    public class CoordinationRTEngine
extends CoordinationEngine
implements RTSimulatorI
    The class CoordinationRTEngine implements a real coordination engine.

    Description

    In the implementation of real time simulation engine, the coordinator plays no role in the execution of the simulation except for the initialisation phase and to start each of the individual atomic models and their atomic real time simulation engines, be them immediate children or descendant models.

    Glass-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2020-11-23

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void hasPerformedExternalEvents(java.lang.String modelURI)
      notify the pa rent model that the child model modelURI has performed its current external events; used when a coupled model has its children models perform the external events sent by other models among its children and need not be called upon its external event step method anymore.
      void hasReceivedExternalEvents(java.lang.String modelURI)
      notify the parent model that the model modelURI has received some external events during the execution of another model internal step and therefore that it will need to perform an external step during the current simulation step.
      void initialiseSimulation(Time startTime, Duration simulationDuration)
      initialise the simulation engine for a run with a time of start set to the given time; for runs that will be stopped by a call to stopSimulation, the duration can be set to infinity.

      • initialiseSimulation

        public void initialiseSimulation(Time startTime,
                                 Duration simulationDuration)
        Description copied from interface: SimulatorI
        initialise the simulation engine for a run with a time of start set to the given time; for runs that will be stopped by a call to stopSimulation, the duration can be set to infinity.

        Contract

         pre     isModelSet()
 pre     !isSimulationInitialised()
 pre     simulationStartTime != null
 pre     simulationStartTime.getTimeUnit().equals(getSimulatedModel().getSimulatedTimeUnit())
 pre     simulationStartTime.greaterThanOrEqual(Time.zero(getSimulatedModel().getSimulatedTimeUnit())) 
 pre     simulationDuration != null
 pre     simulationDuration.getTimeUnit().equals(getSimulatedModel().getSimulatedTimeUnit())
 pre     simulationDuration.greaterThan(Duration.zero(getSimulatedModel().getSimulatedTimeUnit()))
 post    !this.getSimulatedModel().isRoot() || isSimulationInitialised()
 post    getNextTimeAdvance().equals(getTimeOfNextEvent().subtract(getTimeOfLastEvent()))
        Specified by:
        initialiseSimulation in interface SimulatorI
        Overrides:
        initialiseSimulation in class CoordinationEngine
        Parameters:
        startTime - time at which the simulation must start.
        simulationDuration - duration of the simulation to be launched.
        See Also:
        CoordinationEngine.initialiseSimulation(fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Time, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Duration)

      • startRTSimulation

        public void startRTSimulation(long realTimeOfStart,
                              double simulationStartTime,
                              double simulationDuration)
        Description copied from interface: SimulationManagementI
        at real time realTimeStart, start a real time collaborative simulation with the simulation clock stating at startTime and lasting simulatedTimeDuration.

        Contract

         pre     realTimeStart > System.currentTimeMillis()
 pre     realTimeStart < Long.MAX_VALUE
 pre     simulationStartTime >= 0.0
 pre     simulationStartTime  < Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 pre     simulationDuration > 0
 pre     simulationDuration <= Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 pre     isRTSchedulerSet()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        startRTSimulation in interface RTSimulatorI
        Specified by:
        startRTSimulation in interface SimulationManagementI
        Overrides:
        startRTSimulation in class SimulationEngine
        Parameters:
        realTimeOfStart - time of start for the simulation, in real time, synchronising all simulation engines.
        simulationStartTime - time at which the simulation starts interpreted in the model simulation time.
        simulationDuration - duration of the simulation interpreted in the model simulation time.
        See Also:
        RTSimulatorI.startRTSimulation(long, double, double)
